adDetails: Do you have a legal problem? Would you like the assistance of an attorney/paralegal team without having to spend a great deal of money? All of our attorneys and paralegals bill at reduced rates. Check our your unbundled legal service options at www.prosaylegalservices.com. You are also welcome to contact us at the e-mail listed above or by phone at show contact info. We will save you money and work diligently and ethically to resolve all of your legal concerns. Contact us! Qualified attorneys and paralegals are standing by. We look forward to assisting you.
